  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_101985</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_101985</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water transforming to ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser, das zum Eis umwandelt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau transformant à la glace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água que transforma ao gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua che trasforma al ghiaccio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ που μετασχηματίζει στον πάγο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua que transforma al hielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that water in the bottle changes to ice. The bottle breaks because water expands as it transforms to ice.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phase transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Wasser in der Flasche 
zum Eis ändert. Die Flasche bricht, weil Wasser erweitert, 
während es umwandelt, um zu gefrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'eau dans la 
bouteille change en la glace. La bouteille se casse parce que 
l'eau augmente pendant qu'elle transforme pour glacer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a água no frasco 
muda ao gelo. O frasco quebra porque a água expande enquanto 
transforma para congelar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che l'acqua nella 
bottiglia cambia a ghiaccio. La bottiglia si rompe perché 
l'acqua si espande mentre trasforma per ghiacciare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το ύδωρ στο μπουκάλι 
αλλάζει στον πάγο. Το μπουκάλι σπάζει επειδή το ύδωρ 
επεκτείνεται όπως μετασχηματίζει στον πάγο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el agua en la 
botella cambia al hielo. La botella se rompe porque el agua se 
amplía mientras que transforma para helar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phase Transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transformation de phase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expansão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transformação da fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ghiaccio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasformazione di fase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επέκταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πάγος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετασχηματισμός φάσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
